ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:17:09 [Issue ID 4000-500339] urn:comicvine:4000-500339 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 20:24:45. [Issue ID 1460049]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Suzie and Jon continue the worst recruitment plan in the history of entertaining second-act montage sequences. Getting the band together never had so many fluids. By Hollywood jerkhole MATT FRACTION (ODY-C, SATELLITE SAM, Hawkeye) and literally a shed-full of car keys that somehow manages to draw comics.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------|--------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Chip Zdarsky | 1 | | Var | XXX Variant Cover | Kate Leth | 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 |
Note: The regular cover was sold at the regular price of $3.50, and the XXX Variant Cover was shipped in a sealed bag and sold at $4.69.
ComicInfo.Title: We Think It's the Fluids That Keep Getting Us Banned on iTunes and Android
